actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend part J of title I of the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to provide to Federal public safety officers the same benefits accorded under such part to State and local public safety officers.

summary.text: Amends title I of the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to provide to Federal public safety officers the same benefits accorded to State and local public safety officers.

titles.title: A bill to amend part J of title I of the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to provide to Federal public safety officers the same benefits accorded under such part to State and local public safety officers.
